attributes.action: allow any car over 25 years of age to be exempt of road tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Classic cars are part of this countries heritage and despite many cars being tax exempt (made before 1973) a lot of classic cars are not. With the energy it takes to manufacture a car being so high and consequently the damage this does to the environment it makes more and more sense to buy a car that has survived many years offsetting these initial environmental costs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
